title: Apollo 12: pinpoint for science
brief_description: The story of the flight of Apollo 12 and the second landing of men on the moon on November 19th 1969. Gives primary emphasis to the lunar exploration carried out by the crew; deployment of scientific equipment, retrieval of parts of a Surveyor space craft which landed on the moon in 1967, and the collection of rock and soil samples. No other credits available
